title: May 1972, New York City font?
content:
Can anyone ID this font please?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080129100026im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/May_1972_NYC_5385.jpg)

 [‹ Liverpool City of Culture Advert - Slab serif?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080129100026/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41135 "Go to previous forum topic") [looking for sans serif extended font from Bluebeam's logotype ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080129100026/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41101 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Povl

comments.content: Looks like the one even though i’m not an expert. But thanks!
